Description:
Unmissable charm, stylish attributes
CONTACT AGENT FOR PRIVATE APPOINTMENT
Bursting with character and irresistible family appeal, this delightful weatherboard home invites effortless everyday living and private entertaining in gorgeous, expansive, established gardens. Superbly appointed with high ceilings, stunning parquetry floors and a modern palette throughout all the living domains. Balancing formal refined living, gas log fire, with a fabulous open plan family/dining set beneath a spectacular Cathedral ceiling emphasising the spaciousness and brilliant natural light in this convivial domain. A vibrant kitchen is well appointed with s/s Blanco appliances including gas cooktop and electric oven, Bosch dishwasher, double sink and huge pantry. Flowing outside to all-seasons covered merbau deck, creating a fabulous connection for entertaining, spilling out to the low-care, landscaped, grassed and brick paved gardens, perfect for busy families, young children and pets.
The main home accommodates 3 sun-splashed bedrooms, BIRs and a neat bathroom with soaking bath, master with leafy street aspect, pretty ceiling rose and ornate cornices.
A self-contained bungalow will surprise you with its stylish interiors displaying a further 2 beds, BIRs, 1 bath, smart kitchen, s/s appliances and carpeted living/dining. Ideal for intergenerational living with private access to its own carport.
Additionally this home is a potential investment/development (STCA) to land bank for the future with the 1033m approx corner block boasting dual crossovers, offering amazing possibilities. Families at every stage and age, those downsizing off an acreage block will be equally smitten with this quaint personality laden home.
Walk to boutique bars, cafes and shops and minutes to Croydon Central and Eastland. Central to Silcock Reserve, Croydon and Town Parks and walking tracks. Close to quality schools incl Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar and Oxley College, minutes to Swinburne TAFE. Handy links to public transport and freeway/Eastlink.
Displaying a single carport at each entrance (one with covered entry) plus ample off-street parking for a caravan, trailer or extras vehicles. Additionally, equipped with GDH throughout, split system, WI linen press, water tank and secure gated surrounds.

Description:
Period Charm Meets Modern Convenience
Proudly poised in one of central Croydon's most esteemed tree-lined streets, this freestanding circa 1890 Edwardian period home is an enchanting example of when old world charm collides with modern-day convenience.
Renovated throughout, in keeping with its traditional period style, the home displays all the hallmarks of a bygone era, whilst offering a well-adapted floorplan that effortlessly accommodates today's families.
A picket fence and well-established gardens dotted with mature Camellias frame its timeless façade - guiding you to the gabled front porch with original lead light feature door. Once inside, dado rail-lined walls and tall ceilings with intricate pressed tin panels greet you in a central hallway, which is flanked by two expansive bedrooms with lead light accented bow bay windows.
A sumptuous lounge and dining room decorated with crystal chandeliers provides substantial space for entertaining. Containing an open gas fireplace plus a built-in wet bar with glass display shelving, built-in cupboard, a bar fridge nook plus French doors to the garden outside. Awash with natural sunlight, the north-facing back half of the home is anchored by a classically renovated kitchen and accompanying meals area. Hosting 900mm stainless steel appliances, an integrated dishwasher plus an abundance of soft-closing cupboards and pantry storage. Two further bedrooms with sliding built-in wardrobes, an elegant bathroom with claw foot bath, separate toilet and a storage-rich laundry can all be accessed from this zone. With French doors offering a seamless transition out to a private courtyard with paved alfresco, built-in gas barbeque and manicured wrap-around gardens.
Hydronic heating, air conditioning, ceiling fans, generous linen press and shed storage plus a gated driveway with single carport are welcome inclusions, enriching what is already an outstanding family home in a superior location. Situated within walking distance to buses, Silcock Reserve, childcare centres, kindergartens, the expanding Croydon Central Shopping Centre, Main Street's vibrant shopping and cafe precinct plus Croydon Train Station for an effortless and convenient CBD commute. Within easy reach of reputable schools including; Croydon Primary, Scared Heart and Good Shepherd Primary Schools, Melba College, Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, Aquinas College and Tintern Grammar.
* Updated circa 1890 Edwardian period home set in one of Croydon's most esteemed tree-lined streets
* Spacious lounge and adjoining dining room
* Classically renovated kitchen with meals area
* Four bedrooms complemented by an elegant bathroom with claw foot bath
* Lovely courtyard with alfresco area and manicured wrap-around gardens
* Hydronic heating, air conditioning and ceiling fans
* Gated driveway with a single carport
* Walking distance to parks and reserves, childcare centres, kindergartens, Croydon Central Shopping Centre, Croydon Main Street. Close to reputable schools.
* Convenient walking access to Croydon Train Station (Lilydale line), bus interchange and Skybus airport service.

CONTACT AGENT FOR PRIVATE APPOINTMENT
Privately set back in arguably one of the most sought-after real estate pockets, this Monastery Ridge precinct home is packaged for unrivalled family living on an expansive and superbly established 1409m2 approx allotment. Multi domains comprise lounge with decorative ceiling rose, pretty cornices and character open fireplace. French windows wrap the open plan family/dining in light-soaked sophistication. BBQs and all scale celebrations will be a delight with frequenting lorikeets, king parrots and eastern rosellas, as will children's playtime with a commercial grade BI playground for hours of endless fun. Serviced by 3 bedrooms, BIRs, and 2 updated bathrooms, master with triple BIRs and in vogue ensuite with large soaking upright bath, rainfall shower and slick black and white tones, including brilliant white plantation shutters.
Enjoy the sensational space or, in time, extend out or add another level (STCA) in an area that will not be built-up due to the historical significance of this area.
Minutes to boutique cafes and restaurants, buses service each end of the street. Walk to Croydon train station, Ainslie Parklands Primary and minutes to a plethora of other quality education with Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, Oxley College and Tintern Grammar easily accessed. Close to Eastland, Mullum Mullum Creek Trail and freeway/Eastlink.
